thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 2 of 693
thread.title: MARK
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by MARK

author: MARK
title: MARK
text:
Great to see they were understanding when my wife rang to inform them I had been held up in not 1 but 2 accidents on my way back to the airport (i was not involved in accident) and would not be back on time for returning of car.
My wife had a problem with no one being in the office to take the call phone rang out x2 and than a non worker answered the phone saying no one was in the office.
When she rang the 1800 number they were very helpful and corrected the time of return with no cost as yet, and I hope not as this could not be helped.
